scripts.test: npm run serve & mocha test/bootstrap.js --recursive test
scripts.build: cat ./src/tincan.js | sed -e "s/__VERSION__/${CIRCLE_SHA1:0:7}/g" | umd Tincan -c | uglifyjs -c -m --mangle-props regex=/^_/ > ./dist/tincan.js
scripts.deploy: if [ -z ${CIRCLE_BUILD_NUM+x} ]; then echo "CIRCLE_BUILD_NUM is unset"; else aws --region us-west-2 s3 cp ./dist/tincan.js s3://sdk.streamrail.com/tincan/tincan.version.$CIRCLE_BUILD_NUM.js; fi
scripts.deploy-prod: if [ -z ${BUILD+x} ]; then echo "BUILD is unset"; else aws --region us-west-2 s3 cp s3://sdk.streamrail.com/tincan/tincan.version.$BUILD.js s3://sdk.streamrail.com/tincan/tincan.js; fi
